title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, define the scope, and identify the target users and their needs.

title: Design System Architecture for VisualDataSummarizer
description: Design the overall system architecture for the VisualDataSummarizer project. This includes defining the data processing pipeline, visualization components, user interface, and data storage. Consider scalability, performance, modularity, and maintainability. Outline the key components, their responsibilities, and how they interact with each other. Detail the approach for handling complex data sets and lengthy text documents, and propose solutions for improving accessibility and usability. Suggest mechanisms for monitoring performance, diagnosing issues, and implementing security measures. Additionally, specify the technology stack and frameworks to be used, ensuring compatibility and extensibility. Ensure that the design takes into account potential future features or improvements. Update the architecture design as necessary based on feedback received from team members during the review process. Upon approval, begin task decomposition and assign appropriate tasks to team members. For this RFC, provide more specific details about data preprocessing techniques, visualization algorithms, and user interface wireframes. Also, propose a strategy for ensuring compatibility with various operating systems and browsers.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Components
description: Implement components for ingesting and processing various data formats, including text documents and structured data sets.

title: Develop Visualization Components
description: Implement components for generating different types of visualizations, such as infographics, charts, and graphs.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the application, including input forms, visualization displays, and user interactions.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing and retrieving data sets and generated visualizations.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures, such as user authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the application's security and data privacy.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated building, testing, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Document the application's features, usage, and technical details for developers and end-users.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the application's quality and functionality.
